### 删除list中的部分元素

#### 直接指定要删除的元素为NULL

```{r}
lts = list(1, 2, 'a', matrix(1:3))
print(length(lts))
lts[[3]]
lts[[3]] = NULL
lts[[3]]
print(length(lts))
```

#### 按照序号/list的name删除，即按照序号或name选择要提取的元素
```{r}
lts = list(1, 2, 'a', matrix(1:3))
print(length(lts))
lts[c(2,4)] = NULL
print(lts)
```

### R中操作符皆为函数
> [参考 Every operation is a function call](http://adv-r.had.co.nz/Functions.html#all-calls)![image](http://note.youdao.com/yws/res/18784/WEBRESOURCEe6d3723df550ea633956f8e28db8cb0c)

具体示例：
```{r}
`+`(3,2)
x = 1:10
`[`(x, 2)
`[`(x, -2)

`[<-`(iris[1:2, ], 'new_col_name', value = "future")
```

### apply类函数中使用符号函数

#### lapply提取元素指定的列

当list中的元素为data.frame/matrix，需要提取其中的指定列

```{r}
lts = split(subset(iris, select = -Species), iris$Species)
str(lts)
# 提取每个list中的1/2列
lts_sel <- lapply(lts, "[", 1:2)
str(lts_sel)

# 提取每个list中的1/2行
lts_sel <- lapply(lts, "[", 1:2, )
lts_sel

# 提取每个list中的1:2行/1:2列
lts_sel <- lapply(lts, "[", 1:2, 1:2)
lts_sel

# 提取每个list中的1:2行/1列
lts_sel <- lapply(lts, "[", 1:2, 1, drop = F)
lts_sel
```

#### mapply给list添加多余列

```{r}
lts = split(subset(iris, select = -Species), iris$Species)
lts <- lapply(lts, "[", 1:2, 1:2)
lts
lts_cols = mapply(`[<-`, lts, 'Species', value = names(lts), SIMPLIFY = FALSE)
lts_cols
lts_cols = mapply(`[<-`, lts, paste0('Species', 1:3), value = names(lts), SIMPLIFY = FALSE)
lts_cols
```

### list合并为dataframe

```{r}

lts_cols = mapply(`[<-`, lts, 'Species', value = names(lts), SIMPLIFY = FALSE)
do.call("rbind", lts_cols)

lts_cols = mapply(`[<-`, lts, paste0('Species', 1:3), value = names(lts), SIMPLIFY = FALSE)
dplyr::bind_rows(lts_cols)
```
